SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_CATE,
BOARD_CNTNT,
BOARD_TITLE, CRET_USER, CRET_DATE, CRET_TIME, CHG_USER, CHG_DATE, CHG_TIME FROM TBRD00100 WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_CATE = #{boardCate}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND BOARD_CNTNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR BOARD_CNTNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))
AND CRET_USER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
ORDER BY BOARD_ID desc LIMIT #{start}, #{size}

SELECT count(*) AS totalCnt FROM TBRD00100 WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_CATE = #{boardCate}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND BOARD_CNTNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR BOARD_CNTNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))
AND CRET_USER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
SELECT * FROM TBRD00100 WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBRD00100( BOARD_CATE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CNTNT, CRET_USER, CRET_DATE, CRET_TIME, CHG_USER, CHG_DATE, CHG_TIME )VALUES( #{boardCate}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardCntnt}, #{cretUser}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i%s'), #{chgUser}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i%s') )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBRD00100 SET BOARD_CATE = #{boardCate}, BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CNTNT= #{boardCntnt}, CHG_USER = #{chgUser}, CHG_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), CHG_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i%s') WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
